champ:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
champ:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Enter champ:Defensive.

champ:SwordSigil.NAME: Sigil of Victory
champ:SwordSigil.DESCRIPTION: Trigger your current Stance's *Skill *Bonus !M! times. NL Exhaust.

champ:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
champ:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, twice if enemy is Vulnerable. NL *Berserker champ:Combo: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

champ:FlashCut.NAME: Flash Strike
champ:FlashCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !M! champ:Counter and !B! Block.

Enter champ:Gladiator. NL Add a random Upgraded *Gladiator champ:Combo to your hand.

champ:ShieldSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, your Skill Bonus effects are increased by !M!.

champ:FocusedBerserking.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Trigger !M! times without exiting your Stance:

champ:SetATrap.NAME: Set A Trap

Enter champ:Gladiator. NL Add a random Upgraded *Gladiator champ:Combo to your hand.

champ:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Berserker champ:Combo: Deals damage twice.
champ:FanOfKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Berserker champ:Combo: Deals damage three times.

champ:Devastate.NAME: Devastate

champ:Control.DESCRIPTION: Enter champ:Defensive or champ:Berserker. NL Add a random champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
champ:Control.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter champ:Defensive or champ:Berserker. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.

Enter champ:Berserker. NL Add a random Upgraded *Berserker champ:Combo to your hand.

champ:Circumvent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! champ:Counter. NL Gain !B! Block. NL *Defensive champ:Combo: Gain Block equal to your champ:Counter.

champ:SkillfulDodge.NAME: Skillful Dodge
champ:SkillfulDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! champ:Counter. NL *Defensive champ:Combo: Increase these effects by !cool! this combat.

champ:TornadoPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !B! Block for each enemy hit.
champ:TornadoPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !B! Block for each enemy hit.

champ:BringItOn.NAME: Bring It On
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am not in a Stance.

champ:FalseCounter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.
